title: Llwybr Ceiriog Trail Walking and Cycle Route
description: A circular walk or cycle through the beautiful Ceiriog Valley. The trail visits the pretty villages of Bronygarth and Pandy and contains some challenging climbs. The views of the River Ceiriog and the hills of the Ceiriog Valley are a stunning reward for your efforts though. The route is well waymarked with a black and white disc.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: To explore the valley further you can pick up the Llwybr Ceiriog Trail which explores the area to the east of this trail. It is coincident with this trail around the village of Pandy. The Llanarmon Dyffryn Ceiriog Walk uses the upper trail to create a circular walk through the area.

display_address: Llansantffraid Glyn Ceiriog, Glyn Ceiriog, Wrexham, Cymru / Wales, LL20 7DF, United Kingdom
